search_results.title: Jane Goodall, famed primatologist and conservationist, dies at 91
search_results.snippet: She was 91 years old. "The Jane Goodall Institute has learned this morning, Wednesday, October 1, 2025, that Dr. Jane Goodall DBE, UN Messenger ...

search_results.title: Jane Goodall, legendary chimp expert, dead at 91 - YouTube
search_results.snippet: Groundbreaking chimpanzee researcher Jane Goodall has died, the institute bearing her name said Wednesday. She was 91 years old.
